name: Mandarin Bubble Bath: Chinese Game
description:
Learn the world's hardest langague and have fun doing it with the Bubble Bath of Knowledge. You'll be surprised at how quickly you will be able to read Chinese.

People from all over the world come to this bubble bath to learn the art of language. New languages open whole new areas of the world. One who can speak many languages can experience more of the world than one who cannot.

Now that you have found this secret location, it is time to learn some Mandarin with this fun Mandarin Game.

Pop the bubbles with Mandarin words and phrases and build your vocabulary. Listen to the words spoken. Pop them before they float away.

The Bubble Bath of Knowledge is arranged into categories based on topics. Each category contains 10 words and phrases. The best area to start with is numbers.

The knowledge is yours. Catch it before it floats away!

If you are interested in learning other langauges, you can also find Bubble Bath games in iTunes for Cantonese, Arabic, Hindi, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian, Thai, Vietnamese, Korean, and Swahili.
